title: "Fuel savings from intelligent cruise a profitable first step towards self-driving trucks"
excerpt: "Driver assistance, adaptive cruise and electronic steering control are some of the latest products aiming to tackle autonomous driving in phases. Traxen, founded in metro Detroit in 2015, has assembled a team of engineers who collectively have decades of practical experience developing vehicle artificial intelligence (AI) for technology suppliers and manufacturers in the automotive and trucking industry."
